title: Quantum Waveform Bubble
prompt: Ultra-modern Chrome extension icon: a smooth speech bubble outline composed of pulsating quantum waveforms. Incorporate subtle neon-purple and electric-blue gradients with faint particle trails. Abstract, futuristic, vector style, high contrast, no text.

title: Neon Vortex Note
prompt: Abstract icon showing a swirling vortex inside a square note outline, symbolizing prompt storage. Use neon-pink, cyan, and midnight-black palette, with dynamic radial lines suggesting energy flow. Crisp vector edges, minimalist, no text.

title: Holographic Brain Note
prompt: Futuristic icon of a floating translucent note page with a glowing holographic neural network (brain) projection above it. Palette: holo-green, electric-blue, dark slate. Sharp tech lines, minimal shadows, vector style, no letters.

title: Ethereal Lens + Prompt
prompt: Transcendent icon depicting a stylized eye-shaped lens overlaying a prompt card. Light pastel gradients of lavender and sky-blue with a soft glow effect. Abstract, minimal strokes, vector format, suggests insight and clarity, no text.

title: Fluxing Data Cube
prompt: Modern icon showing a 3D cube made of translucent layers, one face replaced by a prompt sheet icon. Layers animated with tiny circuit patterns in neon-teal and deep indigo. Crisp vector, abstract sci-fi aesthetic, no letters.

title: Circuit Orb Memo
prompt: Futuristic circular icon: a glowing orb of intersecting circuit traces hovering above a minimalist memo sheet. Use gradients of silver and electric-blue with subtle glow. Clean vector lines, modern tech feel, no text.

title: Infinite Loop Prompt
prompt: Abstract icon featuring two intertwined loops forming an infinity symbol, with one loop stylized as a document and the other as a chat bubble. Palette: neon orange and charcoal. Sleek vector design, high contrast, no text.
